other resources to learn about ggstatsplot

Indrajeet Patil

2021-06-07

Source: vignettes/web_only/other_resources.Rmd
other_resources.Rmd

Introduction

One of the best resources to learn about functionality afforded by ggstatsplot package is to read the dedicated website. A lot of love and work has gone into writing detailed function documentation and vignettes, and I will highly recommend you check them out.

But, the website is certainly not the only resource available to learn about this package, and below are some other resources that might be helpful for you to learn about ggstatsplot package.

Presentations

  • My own xaringan presentation: https://indrajeetpatil.github.io/ggstatsplot_slides/slides/ggstatsplot_presentation.html#1

YouTube Videos

My own talks at online meetings

  • At UseR Oslo meeting

  • At R-Ladies Tunis meeting

Other

English

  • Yury Zablotski’s review

  • Business Science R tips

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aw6HDz9zA1Q

  • Serdar Belci’s demo on how to use ggstatsplot in jamovi GUI software

  • Data pre-processing and analysis in RStudio and ggstatsplot

Other languages

  • Pablo Vallejo Medina’s demo of ggbetweenstats (in Spanish)

  • Andre Chocó Cedillos’s talk (in Spanish)

Blogs

This is a bit difficult to keep track of. I would recommend just googling it.

Publications

A list of publications that use ggstatsplot can be found in Google Scholar:

https://scholar.google.com/scholar?hl=en&scisbd=2&as_sdt=0%2C22&q=ggstatsplot&btnG=
